trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Durban
There were no other sightings in Durban on or around August 17th 1992
divs: sighting detailsthis was a good few years ago, about 14 years back, im 26 now, so i was about 12 at the time. was at my cousin house in hillcrest, a suburb near durban, we had been playing ���1,2,3 block��� running round the house and carrying on for a while, we were still playing as it became dark. i ran around the garage, and as i came round the corner, i just got a feeling, i cannot explain it, something just told me to look, and as i did, i saw a child sized alien being, just beside the flower bed, as i looked at it, i got the weirdest feeling ever, its was almost like i got a very small nervous shock, my whole body like jolted as i made eye contact with the being, i starred at the alien for a while, about 30secs-1min, shitting myself and not sure what to do, ran away, called me cousins to come look, didn���t say what i had seen, but when i returned with them, there was nothing there anymore. the being was small, about 3-4 feet, i could only see the top half, as the rest\ the below half was in the dark (outside light) its was a purple-blue-black colour, dark, large head with very large eyes. observing us\me playing in the garden??
Summary: I saw an Alien being, No UFO
